name: DadDeck™ - Cross-Feature Polish
description: Micro-tasks for shared UX, theme, mobile, analytics, and accessibility improvements across the entire app.

userStories.title: Add dark mode toggle to navigation
userStories.description: Theme switcher in main navigation bar.
acceptanceCriteria: Add sun/moon icon toggle to nav
Clicking toggles between light and dark mode
Icon shows current theme (sun = light, moon = dark)

userStories.title: Implement theme persistence in localStorage
acceptanceCriteria: On theme change, save to localStorage
On app load, read from localStorage
Test theme persists across browser sessions

userStories.title: Add auto theme detection
acceptanceCriteria: Listen for changes in system preference
Update theme automatically when system changes
Only applies when theme set to 'auto'
Test auto detection follows system setting

userStories.title: Create dark mode CSS classes
acceptanceCriteria: Create dark: prefix for dark mode variants
Background colors: dark-gray-900 for backgrounds, gray-100 for text
Apply dark: classes to all components
Test dark mode looks good and readable

userStories.title: Add smooth theme transition animation
userStories.description: Fade between light and dark themes.
acceptanceCriteria: Add CSS transition to theme colors

userStories.title: Add high contrast mode option
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'High Contrast' toggle to theme settings
When enabled, use maximum contrast colors
Black backgrounds, white text, no grays
Test high contrast mode is very readable

userStories.title: Optimize touch targets to 44px minimum
userStories.description: Ensure all interactive elements are touch-friendly.
acceptanceCriteria: Audit all buttons and interactive elements
Ensure minimum touch target size is 44×44px
Add padding to small buttons to reach 44px
Check navigation links, pack open button, filters
Test all buttons easy to tap on mobile
Document any elements below 44px for fixing

userStories.title: Add swipe gestures for card navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Add visual feedback during swipe (card follows finger)

userStories.title: Implement pull-to-refresh on collection
userStories.description: Pull down to refresh collection view.
acceptanceCriteria: When user pulls down, show loading indicator
On release, reload collection data from IndexedDB

userStories.title: Configure responsive breakpoints
acceptanceCriteria: Test layouts work at all breakpoints

userStories.title: Add pack opening analytics event
acceptanceCriteria: Log event with: packId, pack type, card count
Send to Google Analytics or Plausible
Test events appear in analytics dashboard

userStories.title: Track filter usage in collection
userStories.description: Track which filters users apply most.
acceptanceCriteria: Track: filter type (rarity, type, holo), filter value
Send to analytics on filter apply

userStories.title: Implement performance monitoring
acceptanceCriteria: Log metrics to analytics (or console in dev)

userStories.title: Add ARIA labels to all interactive elements
acceptanceCriteria: Audit all buttons, links, inputs for missing ARIA
Add aria-label to icon-only buttons (e.g., share icon)
Add aria-label to search inputs ('Search cards by name')
Test screen reader announces all elements

userStories.title: Implement keyboard navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Add tabindex to all interactive elements
Ensure logical tab order (left to right, top to bottom)
Add focus visible styles (outline or glow)
Pack opening: Space to skip, Arrows to navigate cards
Collection: Tab to browse cards, Enter to open detail
Test entire app works with keyboard only

userStories.title: Add screen reader announcements
userStories.description: Announce important events to screen readers.
acceptanceCriteria: Add aria-live region for pack status
Announce card reveals: 'Revealed Mythic BBQ Dad'
Announce pack complete: 'Pack opening complete, 7 cards revealed'

userStories.title: Add skip to main content link
userStories.description: Allow keyboard users to skip navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Skip to content' link at top of page
Link is visible on keyboard focus (hidden otherwise)
Pressing Tab from top shows link first
Enter moves focus to main content

userStories.title: Add focus trap in modals
acceptanceCriteria: When modal opens, move focus to first focusable element
Tab cycles focus within modal only
Escape key closes modal and returns focus

userStories.title: Add error boundary with fallback UI
userStories.description: Graceful error handling across entire app.
acceptanceCriteria: Wrap entire app in error boundary
On error, show friendly error UI (not blank screen)
Error message explains what went wrong

userStories.title: Implement offline detection
userStories.description: Show offline page when no internet.
acceptanceCriteria: Add offline event listener to window
Offline page explains app requires internet
When back online, redirect to requested page

userStories.title: Add loading skeleton for pack generation
userStories.description: Show loading state while pack generates.
acceptanceCriteria: When generation complete, skeleton fades out
Test skeleton makes wait feel shorter

userStories.title: Add toast notification system
acceptanceCriteria: Show toast for: errors, successes, info
Toast appears in corner (bottom-right or top-center)
Toast has close button for manual dismiss
Test toasts are informative and non-intrusive

userStories.title: Add favicon for browser tabs
userStories.description: Show icon in browser tab bar.
acceptanceCriteria: Add favicon link tags to src/layouts/BaseLayout.astro
Test favicon appears in browser tab

userStories.title: Configure dynamic meta tags
acceptanceCriteria: Add dynamic title and description per route
Test titles are descriptive and unique

userStories.title: Add Open Graph tags for sharing
userStories.description: Rich link previews on social platforms.
acceptanceCriteria: Add og:title, og:description, og:image meta tags
og:image points to DadDeck logo or card image

userStories.title: Add Twitter Card meta tags
acceptanceCriteria: Test tweet preview shows card image

userStories.title: Generate sitemap.xml
acceptanceCriteria: Add lastmod date for each page
Submit sitemap to Google Search Console

userStories.title: Add robots.txt file
acceptanceCriteria: Disallow any admin/private routes if they exist

userStories.title: Add service worker for offline support
acceptanceCriteria: Cache core assets: HTML, CSS, JS, images
Cache version: use build hash in cache names

userStories.title: Add manifest.json for PWA
acceptanceCriteria: Test app is installable on mobile

userStories.title: Add add to homescreen prompt
userStories.description: Prompt mobile users to install app.
acceptanceCriteria: Show 'Add to Home Screen' modal on iOS
Show native install prompt on Android
Explain benefits: 'Open packs offline, faster access'
Test prompt appears at appropriate time

userStories.title: Add app theme color to browser UI
acceptanceCriteria: Test browser address bar color matches theme

userStories.title: Add 404 error page
acceptanceCriteria: Add friendly '404 - Page Not Found' message
Add 'Back Home' button to landing page
Test 404 page appears for invalid routes

userStories.title: Add keyboard shortcuts help modal
acceptanceCriteria: List shortcuts: Space (skip), Enter (open), Arrows (navigate), Esc (close)
Test modal helps users discover shortcuts

userStories.title: Add progressive enhancement for JavaScript
acceptanceCriteria: Verify critical links work with JS disabled
Ensure pack opening page requires JS (expected)
Message: 'For best experience, please enable JavaScript'
Test basic navigation works without JS

userStories.title: Add link prefetching for faster navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Add <link rel='prefetch'> for likely next pages
Prefetch: pack page from landing, collection from pack
Use DNS prefetch for external domains
Test navigation to prefetched pages is instant

userStories.title: Add console error logging to analytics
userStories.description: Track errors that occur in production.
acceptanceCriteria: Add global error listener to window.onerror
Log error: message, url, line number, stack
Send errors to analytics (Sentry or GA)

userStories.title: Add user feedback widget
acceptanceCriteria: Add feedback button to footer or navigation
Modal includes: feedback type dropdown, message input, email
On submit, send to feedback service or email

userStories.title: Add cookie consent banner
acceptanceCriteria: "Accept" button closes banner and sets consent cookie

metadata.focus: Cross-feature polish and shared UX improvements
